meanings.definition: A book in digital form that can be read on a computer or electronic device.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded an ebook to read on my tablet.
meanings.sent2: She prefers reading ebooks on her e-reader.
meanings.sent3: The ebook was so interesting that I forgot to eat my snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an ebook full of stories waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The ebook sparkled with knowledge, inviting me to dive in.

meanings.definition: To publish a book in digital form.
meanings.sent1: Authors often choose to ebook their novels for wider reach.
meanings.sent2: They decided to ebook their latest work to reach a larger audience.
meanings.sent3: I will ebook my poetry collection and share it with the world.
meanings.sent4: She wanted to ebook her memoir as a gift to her grandchildren.
meanings.sent5: The author's decision to ebook the novel revolutionized the publishing industry.
